title: Save Me
description: Twenty-three year old Layla Carter has it all – at least on the surface. She’s stunningly beautiful, rich, and a former child star turned Hollywood Starlet. But what lurks beneath all of that is a broken girl struggling with many different addictions. A girl that just wants to be loved. Enter Leo Marsden. President of the Disciples, a Los Angeles based biker club.He’s rough, weathered, and lives on the edge. He’s not at all Layla’s usual type. He's not rich. He's not famous. He barely even has two dimes to rub together – but there’s something about him. Something Layla can’t resist...Save Me is Abigail Stone's debut romantic novel. It’s dark, gritty and deliciously erotic with a twist that is sure to have you glued to your screen. Intended for adults 18+ only – some taboo themes!
author: Abigail Stone
